questions.question: What is one of the main objectives of Learning Unit 5?
choices: Learn to play traditional Timorese instruments
Understand how different types of music affect health and wellbeing
Study the history of Western classical music
questions.answer: Understand how different types of music affect health and wellbeing

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a topic covered in Learning Unit 5?
choices: Analyzing the healing elements in Timorese music
questions.answer: The physics of sound waves

questions.question: What is one of the activities mentioned in Learning Unit 5?
choices: Group analysis of traditional Timorese songs for healing elements
Writing a research paper on music history
Conducting a clinical trial on music therapy
questions.answer: Group analysis of traditional Timorese songs for healing elements

questions.question: What is the definition of music therapy provided in the lesson plan?
choices: The use of music to improve physical and mental health
The study of musical instruments in different cultures
The practice of composing therapeutic music
The analysis of musical structures in healing rituals
questions.answer: The use of music to improve physical and mental health

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as a key vocabulary term in the lesson plan?
questions.answer: Pitch

questions.question: What is the warm-up activity described in the lesson plan?
choices: Playing a short clip of Timorese traditional music and discussing feelings
Analyzing the lyrics of a popular song
questions.answer: Playing a short clip of Timorese traditional music and discussing feelings

questions.question: How long is the presentation of main lesson content scheduled to last?
questions.answer: 30 minutes

questions.question: What is one of the tasks in the group analysis activity?
choices: Analyze a Timorese traditional song for healing elements
questions.answer: Analyze a Timorese traditional song for healing elements

questions.question: What is the production task described in the lesson plan?
choices: Creating a healing playlist for a specific health concern
Writing a research paper on Timorese music
Composing a new piece of music
questions.answer: Creating a healing playlist for a specific health concern

questions.question: How long should the healing playlist be in the production task?
questions.answer: 15 minutes

questions.question: What is one of the homework assignments given?
choices: Research and write about a traditional Timorese instrument
questions.answer: Research and write about a traditional Timorese instrument

questions.question: According to the lesson plan, what should students do with their created playlist as part of their homework?
choices: Listen to it for 15 minutes each day and journal about the effects
Share it with friends and family for feedback
Perform it live in the next class
questions.answer: Listen to it for 15 minutes each day and journal about the effects

questions.question: What is the definition of 'tempo' provided in the key vocabulary?
choices: The speed or pace of a piece of music
The loudness of a musical piece
The emotional quality of a song
The number of instruments in a composition
questions.answer: The speed or pace of a piece of music

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a way music can be used therapeutically?
questions.answer: Improving mathematical skills

questions.question: What is the definition of 'timbre' given in the key vocabulary?
choices: The character or quality of a musical sound independent of its pitch or volume
The speed of a musical piece
The emotional impact of a song
questions.answer: The character or quality of a musical sound independent of its pitch or volume

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as a consideration when analyzing Timorese songs for healing elements?
questions.answer: Instrument manufacturing process

questions.question: What is the main goal of the course as stated in the course overview?
choices: To equip participants with practical skills to use sound healing techniques in their communities
questions.answer: To equip participants with practical skills to use sound healing techniques in their communities

questions.question: Which learning unit focuses on the science behind sound and healing?
questions.answer: Learning Unit 2

questions.question: What is one of the activities mentioned in Learning Unit 3: Voice as a Healing Instrument?
questions.answer: Group toning exercise

questions.question: Which learning unit covers the topic of facilitating sound healing sessions?
questions.answer: Learning Unit 7

questions.question: What is one of the suggested items to cover in the course?
choices: Cultural sensitivity in applying sound healing techniques
questions.answer: Cultural sensitivity in applying sound healing techniques

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as a required resource for the course?
questions.answer: Professional recording studio

questions.question: What type of practical experience is suggested in the course outline?
choices: Organizing sound healing sessions at local community centers
questions.answer: Organizing sound healing sessions at local community centers

questions.question: What is one of the additional resources mentioned for the course?
choices: Books on sound healing (with translated summaries if not available in Tetum)
Musical scores of Western classical compositions
questions.answer: Books on sound healing (with translated summaries if not available in Tetum)

questions.question: Which learning unit focuses on sound healing techniques for common health issues?
questions.answer: Learning Unit 6

questions.question: What is one of the topics covered in Learning Unit 8: Integrating Sound Healing in Timorese Healthcare?
questions.answer: Current healthcare landscape in Timor-Leste

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a learning objective for the entire course?
choices: Understand the basic principles of sound healing
Develop skills to facilitate sound healing sessions
Learn to read and write Western musical notation
Explore the cultural significance of sound in Timorese healing traditions
questions.answer: Learn to read and write Western musical notation

questions.question: What is the recommended length of the report on a traditional Timorese instrument in the homework assignment?
questions.answer: One page

questions.question: How many Timorese traditional songs are students required to include in their healing playlist?
questions.answer: At least one

questions.question: What is the definition of 'harmony' provided in the key vocabulary?
choices: The combination of simultaneously sounded musical notes to produce chords
The speed of a musical piece
The pattern of regular or irregular pulses in music
A sequence of musical notes that form a recognizable tune
questions.answer: The combination of simultaneously sounded musical notes to produce chords
